General.Name: Brown Advisory US Smaller Companies PLC
General.Description: Jupiter US Smaller Companies PLC is a closed ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Jupiter Unit Trust Managers Limited. It invests in public equity markets of the United States. The fund seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. It primarily invests in value stocks of small and mid-cap companies having a market capitalization from $100 million and $5 billion. The fund benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the Russell 2000 Index. Jupiter US Smaller Companies PLC was formed on January 1, 1993 and is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Grosvenor Place, London, United Kingdom, SW1X 7JJ
